Texts.Chs: 使用步枪和弓时，其基础攻击力增加至120%。
Texts.Eng: 120% Base Power with Rifles and Bows.

Texts.Chs: 士兵神射手的升级版：理想射击启用时，攻击倍乘增加150％，但会完全失去行动能力。受到攻击会提前打破此效果，且不会正常降低冷却时间。必须在地面上才能激活。
Texts.Eng: An upgrade to Marksman: while Ideal Shot is active, Power Multiplier is increased by 150%, but movement is completely disabled. Getting hit prematurely breaks this effect without the normal reduction to cooldown. Must be on ground to activate.

Texts.Chs: 驻足的每秒，流血几率增加+2.5％，直至+50％，流血时长增加+0.05秒，直至+1秒。
Texts.Eng: Every second while still, Bleed Chance increases by +2.5% up to +50%, and Bleed Length increases by +0.05 seconds, up to +1 second.
